ComicInfo.Summary:
Savage Dragon turns up in the year 2965, on a day when the Pantheon Of Super-Heroes is having tryouts.
Savage Dragon turns up in Midway City, 1962.
ComicInfo.Teams: Round Table of America,Pantheon Of Heroes
ComicInfo.Title: The Society of Evil Minds; Savage Dragon vs. Horde; The Society Of Evil Minds part 2; The Round Table of America; Doctor Weird Master of the Macabre; The Pantheon Of Super-Heroes; Knight Watchman and Kid Galahad; Ultiman; Knight Watchman and Dr. Weird
